file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-27-01-04 - BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT FAN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT FAN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the baggage compartment fan. B. The baggage compartment fan is installed at the aft pressure bulkhead partition. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CLASS-C BAGGAGE BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT FAN - RE- 21-27-01-000-801-A COMPARTMENT MOVAL CLASS-C BAGGAGE BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT FAN - IN- 21-27-01-400-801-A COMPARTMENT STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-27-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-27-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 2. BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT FAN - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the baggage compartment fan. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Rear fuselage II D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Aft electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the MISCELLANEOUS/BAGGAGE - RECIRC FAN circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Open access panel 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector (4). (2) Remove the screws (3) and washers (2). (3) Remove the baggage compartment fan (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-27-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT Baggage Compartment Fan - Removal/Installation Figure 401 AFT PRESSURE BULKHEAD PARTITION (REF.) A B CHECK VALVE (REF.) DET. A 1. BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT FAN 2. WASHER 3. SCREW DET. B 4. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 145AMM210182.MCE C EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-27-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-27-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 3. BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT FAN - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the baggage compartment fan. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Rear fuselage II D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Aft electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Make sure that the MISCELLANEOUS/BAGGAGE - RECIRC FAN circuit breaker is open and safetied. J. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Position the baggage compartment fan (1). (2) Install the washers (2) and screws (3). (3) Connect the electrical connector (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-27-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the MISCELLANEOUS/BAGGAGE - RECIRC FAN circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (2) Close access panel 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-27-01 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
